summary: The module contains a unittest suite that runs parameterized tests on the ConvertToMultiChannelBasedOnBratsClasses transform, checking that different input array/tensor types are correctly converted into multi‑channel tensors with the expected shape, type, and content.
business_intent: To automatically verify the correctness of the multi‑channel conversion preprocessing step used in brain tumor segmentation pipelines, preventing regressions and ensuring downstream models receive properly formatted inputs.
